questions.question: What is the predominant color scheme of the plates and bowls, considering the visible gradients and shades?

Considering the visual appearance and stacking, what seems to be the primary material used in manufacturing these items?

What is the apparent texture of the surface, judging from the image's visible detail?

Regarding the color distribution, is the swirl pattern consistent across all plates and bowls, or does it show variations?
Considering the number of plates and bowls shown, what might be the intended use for this set?
What is the apparent finish or effect on the surface, suggesting subtle variations of light and shade?
Looking at the stacks, what is the apparent height/size of the individual plates?
